children.description: Content rendered inside the breadcrumb item. (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the breadcrumb item.

component.description: Sets the base component to render. Defaults to <a> (Type: React.ElementType)

isActive.description: Flag indicating whether the item is active.

isDropdown.description: Flag indicating whether the item contains a dropdown.

render.description: A render function to render the component inside the breadcrumb item. (React component or element)

showDivider.description: Internal prop set by Breadcrumb on all but the first crumb
